title: Gouveia (José Maria de)
body: Born in Funchal on March 13, 1856, and had been residing on the mainland for many years. He was a colonel of infantry, and in 1895, he published a booklet in this city entitled 'Serviço de Campanha, Instrução Pratica de secção para uso dos oficiais inferiores da arma de infantaria'. He passed away in Lisbon in November 1930.

1895: José Maria de Gouveia published a booklet in 1895
